authentication.description: The requested page requires authentication. Please provide your authentication details in the text field below.

catalogs.noMatches: No catalogs match the given search criteria.

deprecation.otherVersionsNotice: This {type} is *not* deprecated, but there are other versions available:
deprecation.warning: Please note that this {type} is deprecated with the potential to be removed anytime. It should be transitioned out of usage as soon as possible. Refrain from using it in new projects.

errors.authFailed: The request errored, the provided authentication details may be incorrect.
errors.badRequest: The request is invalid. This might be due to invalid parameters, e.g. in a search request, or could be a bug in STAC Browser.
errors.contactProvider: Please contact the service operator to resolve this issue.
errors.default: The requested page could not be loaded.
errors.forbidden: The credentials specified for this request are invalid, e.g. an expired or invalid API token. Please provide other credentials and try again.
errors.invalidJsonObject: The response is not a valid JSON object.
errors.invalidStacCollections: The API response is not a valid list of STAC Collections.
errors.invalidStacItems: The API response is not a valid list of STAC Items.
errors.loadApiCollectionsFailed: The API Collections could not be loaded.
errors.loadApiItemsFailed: The API Items could not be loaded.
errors.loadFilteredItems: Sorry, loading a filtered list of Items failed.
errors.loadItems: Sorry, loading the list of STAC Items failed.
errors.networkError: This issue may occur when servers don't allow external access via web browsers (e.g., when CORS headers are not present). @:errors.contactProvider
errors.noExternalAccess: Accessing external catalogs is not allowed!
errors.notFound: The requested resource does not exist. @:errors.contactProvider
errors.unauthorized: The request lacks credentials, e.g. an API token. Please provide your credentials and try again.

featureExperimental: This feature is still experimental and may give unexpected results!

index.specifyCatalog: Please specify a STAC Catalog or API...
index.urlMissingHost: The URL is missing a host.
index.urlMissingProtocol: The URL is missing a protocol.

stayLayer.error: Sorry, adding the data to the map failed.

search.likeOperatorDescription: You can use wildcard characters. `_` matches a single character, `%` matches any number of characters. To search for a wildcard character specifically, you need to add a `\` in front of the character.
search.metaDescription: Search through the data offering of {title}.
search.noItemsFound: No items found for the given filters.
search.notFullySupported: Not all of the options may be supported.
